2005.context: Box, Inc. is a cloud content management and collaboration platform focused on enterprise file sharing, security, and workflow automation. Founded for consumer cloud storage, pivoted to enterprise focus.

competitors.name: Dropbox
competitors.notes: User-friendly interface, focused on individuals and small businesses

competitors.name: Microsoft OneDrive
competitors.notes: Cloud storage integrated with Microsoft products

competitors.name: Google Drive
competitors.notes: Popular for businesses using Google Workspace

2010.context: Box, Inc. is a cloud content management and collaboration platform focused on enterprise file sharing, security, and workflow automation. Enterprise cloud storage and collaboration. Competing with Dropbox.

competitors.name: Google Docs
competitors.notes: Document collaboration, not yet Google Drive

2015.context: Box, Inc. is a cloud content management and collaboration platform focused on enterprise file sharing, security, and workflow automation. IPO. Security and compliance focus for regulated industries.

competitors.name: Microsoft OneDrive
competitors.notes: Preferred for Microsoft 365 users, improved business integration

competitors.name: Dropbox
competitors.notes: Core cloud storage platform targeting broader audience

competitors.name: Google Drive
competitors.notes: Cloud storage integrated with Google Workspace

competitors.name: iManage Work
competitors.notes: Document management, divested from HP in 2015

2020.context: Box, Inc. is a cloud content management and collaboration platform focused on enterprise file sharing, security, and workflow automation. Remote work drove cloud content adoption. Box Shield for security.

2024.context: Box, Inc. is a cloud content management and collaboration platform focused on enterprise file sharing, security, and workflow automation. AI-powered content intelligence. Box Hubs for content portals.

competitors.name: Google Drive
competitors.notes: Top competitor with comprehensive cloud storage and collaboration

competitors.name: Dropbox Business
competitors.notes: 134.7M monthly visits (Nov 2024), major cloud storage competitor

competitors.name: Egnyte Connect
competitors.notes: Unified content security for multicloud, 16,000+ organizations

competitors.name: Amazon WorkDocs
competitors.notes: AWS enterprise document storage and collaboration

competitors.name: M-Files
competitors.notes: Knowledge work automation platform with AI features

2025.context: Box, Inc. is a cloud content management and collaboration platform focused on enterprise file sharing, security, and workflow automation. Enterprise content cloud with AI. Competing with Microsoft SharePoint.

competitors.name: Dropbox
competitors.notes: Primary competitor in cloud file storage and sharing, though Dropbox focuses more on individual/SMB while Box targets enterprise

competitors.name: Microsoft OneDrive/SharePoint
competitors.notes: Integrated with Microsoft 365 suite, major competitor for enterprise content management

competitors.name: Google Drive
competitors.notes: Cloud storage integrated with Google Workspace, competing for enterprise collaboration

competitors.name: Citrix ShareFile
competitors.notes: Enterprise file sharing and sync with focus on security and compliance

competitors.name: Egnyte
competitors.notes: Hybrid cloud content platform targeting enterprise file services and governance

competitors.name: Dropbox Business
competitors.notes: Enterprise-focused offering competing for business cloud storage market

competitors.name: iManage
competitors.notes: Document management for professional services competing in legal and financial verticals

competitors.name: M-Files
competitors.notes: Intelligent information management platform competing in enterprise content management

mentionedBy.name: Dropbox Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Founded 2005, two years before Dropbox, enterprise-focused

mentionedBy.name: Dropbox Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Enterprise-focused with 10 GB free storage, enhanced security

mentionedBy.name: Dropbox Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Enterprise-focused with enhanced security and collaboration
